thread.title: Bayshore Networks Selected as 2015 SINET 16 Innovator
thread.title_full: Bayshore Networks Selected as 2015 SINET 16 Innovator

author: admin
title: Bayshore Networks Selected as 2015 SINET 16 Innovator
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Bayshore Networks, Inc. 
NEW YORK, NY -- (Marketwired) -- 10/21/15 -- Bayshore Networks®, the cybersecurity leader for the Industrial Internet of Things, today announced that it has been selected as one of the 2015 SINET 16 innovators. This year 122 candidates applied for the honor. The 16 winners will present at the SINET Showcase to be held at the National Press Club on November 4th. 
"I am pleased to recognize Bayshore as one of the SINET 16 Innovators chosen by our esteemed evaluation committee," said Robert D. Rodriguez, Chairman & Founder of SINET. "One hundred and twenty two companies applied to be selected in this year's class, which proved to be our most competitive evaluation process since we began the SINET Showcase six years ago. This award serves as a tribute to Bayshore's innovative IT/OT gateway platform approach towards solving a very difficult problem." 
The Bayshore IT/OT Gateway is a cloud-based, content-aware cybersecurity platform for industrial organizations. The Gateway provides IT organizations with a policy-based platform that can inspect and filter OT application layer content and enforce security, operational and safety policies. The Gateway's extremely granular content inspection, coupled with Bayshore's domain expertise in industrial protocols and applications, enables secure machine transactions in industrial settings. 
SINET Showcase provides a platform to identify and highlight "best-of-class" security companies that are addressing industry and government's most pressing needs and requirements. Learn more about the winners and SINET at http://www.security-innovation.org/ 
About Bayshore Networks®, Inc. Bayshore Networks, named a Gartner Cool Vendor and SINET 16 Innovator for 2015, is the cybersecurity leader for the industrial Internet of Things. The Company's award-winning, patented Bayshore IT/OT Gateway deploys as a cloud-based platform, providing Fortune 1000 industrial enterprises with unprecedented visibility into their networks. It enables secure IoT and OT data and transactions in manufacturing operations, utilities, oil and gas, and smart cities. 
The Bayshore platform deploys from the cloud, as a virtual machine, or as a gateway hardware appliance. Bayshore has strategic partnerships with leading technology companies including Cisco Systems, BAE Systems and VMware. http://bayshorenetworks.com . Contact:
